SELECT c.ID, c.VERSION, c.CREATE_TIME, c.COURSE_NAME, c.COURSE_TYPE, c.DESCRIDE, c.SCORE FROM COURSE c JOIN MAJOR_COURSE mc ON c.ID = mc.COURSE_ID WHERE mc.MAJOR_ID = #{majorId}
order by ID desc

SELECT c.ID, c.VERSION, c.CREATE_TIME, c.COURSE_NAME, c.COURSE_TYPE, c.DESCRIDE, c.SCORE FROM COURSE c LEFT JOIN MAJOR_COURSE mc ON c.ID = mc.COURSE_ID WHERE mc.MAJOR_ID = #{majorId} OR c.COURSE_TYPE = 2
order by ID desc

SELECT c.ID, c.VERSION, c.CREATE_TIME, c.COURSE_NAME, c.COURSE_TYPE, c.DESCRIDE, c.SCORE FROM COURSE c JOIN STUDENT_COURSE sc ON c.ID = sc.COURSE_ID WHERE sc.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId}
order by ID desc
